content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":256852,"originalJapaneseLine":"これがあの人の元気の素、明日への活力になっているのです。","translatedEnglishLine":"This is that person's source of energy, the vitality for tomorrow."},{"lineNumber":256853,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルさんと居るだけでも元気になるのですが、今は非常時、もっとたくさんの刺激を求めています。","translatedEnglishLine":"Just being with Shiiru-san gives me energy, but now is an emergency, so I'm seeking even more stimulation."},{"lineNumber":256854,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・わ、私もやりますとか誰かがランスの元へいくとか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"...Uh, someone saying I'll do it too or going to Rance..."},{"lineNumber":256855,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城、廊下","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle, hallway."},{"lineNumber":256856,"originalJapaneseLine":"何か行列が出来ている・・並んでいるキャラは誰でもいいです","translatedEnglishLine":"There’s some kind of line forming... it doesn’t matter who’s standing in it."},{"lineNumber":256857,"originalJapaneseLine":"みんななんで並んでいるのか分からない、","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone doesn’t know why they’re lined up."},{"lineNumber":256858,"originalJapaneseLine":"何かいい物がもえるのかもとランスも並びます","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance also lines up, thinking maybe they’ll get something good."},{"lineNumber":256859,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニーか何かの店＝購買部のパン屋みたいなノリ","translatedEnglishLine":"Like a honey shop or something—the mood is like the bakery in the sales department."},{"lineNumber":256860,"originalJapaneseLine":"何がもらえるんだ・・わくわくしていた","translatedEnglishLine":"What will we get... I was excited."},{"lineNumber":256861,"originalJapaneseLine":"はい、食券と・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Here, a meal ticket and..."},{"lineNumber":256862,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　汎用なので短めでシンプルに・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Since it's generic, keep it short and simple..."},{"lineNumber":256863,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　食券もらうだけのコマンドです","translatedEnglishLine":"It's just a command to receive a meal ticket."},{"lineNumber":256864,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tあけましておめでとう","translatedEnglishLine":"Happy New Year."},{"lineNumber":256865,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tランス城でそれぽい朝の儀式、おとそ、お年玉","translatedEnglishLine":"A New Year’s morning ceremony at Rance Castle: Otoso (spiced sake), New Year's money."},{"lineNumber":256866,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t各国の首脳陣も集まっている（一応、滅亡の可能性があるのでＩＦ処理で）","translatedEnglishLine":"The leaders of various countries are gathered (with an IF branch in case of possible destruction)."},{"lineNumber":256867,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t今、戦争中という雰囲気をみじんも見せずにお正月ムード","translatedEnglishLine":"Even though there’s a war going on now, not a hint of it shows—just New Year's mood."},{"lineNumber":256868,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tたんたんとお正月シーンが続く・・（少し長めでもいい、場違いな雰囲気が大事　）","translatedEnglishLine":"The New Year's scene continues plainly... (a little longer is fine, the out-of-place atmosphere is important)."},{"lineNumber":256869,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t　　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":256870,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tビスケッタさんが、１０時になりました、時報のようにいいます","translatedEnglishLine":"Bisketta-san says, 'It is now 10 o'clock,' like a time signal."},{"lineNumber":256871,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tすると、みんな立ち上がり、さぁ、お正月はおしまい、仕事、仕事と・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Then everyone stands up, saying, 'Alright, New Year's is over, work, work...'"},{"lineNumber":256872,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tパキパキと切り替えていく","translatedEnglishLine":"They switch gears briskly."},{"lineNumber":256873,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tランスが、うむむ・・情緒のわからんやつだ、お正月は３日は仕事したら駄目なんだぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance says, 'Hmm... What a guy without emotion, you’re not supposed to work for the first three days of New Year’s.'"},{ "lineNumber": 256874, "originalJapaneseLine": "旦那様、旦那様が決めた事ですよ、こんな非常時だがお正月はする、２時間だけと割り切ってすると", "translatedEnglishLine": "Master, this is what you decided. Even in such an emergency, we do celebrate New Year's, but only for two hours, with a clear limit." },{ "lineNumber": 256875, "originalJapaneseLine": "うう・・しかしな、やっぱ正月だぞ・・", "translatedEnglishLine": "Ugh... but still, it’s New Year’s after all..." },{ "lineNumber": 256876, "originalJapaneseLine": "これが人類にとって最後のお正月になってもいいのでしたらね", "translatedEnglishLine": "If this is to be humanity’s last New Year’s, then so be it." },{ "lineNumber": 256877, "originalJapaneseLine": "また、世界には今も死にかけている人が多数おり、ランスさんが動かないと今もまた・・", "translatedEnglishLine": "Also, there are still many people near death around the world, and if Rance doesn’t act, even now..." },{ "lineNumber": 256878, "originalJapaneseLine": "ああ、もう・・わかった", "translatedEnglishLine": "Ah, geez... I get it." },{ "lineNumber": 256879, "originalJapaneseLine": "今や世界の命運を握る存在となったこのランスにゆっくりとしたお正月は無かった。", "translatedEnglishLine": "Rance, who now holds the fate of the world in his hands, had no leisurely New Year’s." },{ "lineNumber": 256880, "originalJapaneseLine": "\t\t川中島カイズ、女神の間に居るクルックー", "translatedEnglishLine": "Kawanakajima Kaizu, Kurukkuu in the Goddess's chamber." },{ "lineNumber": 256881, "originalJapaneseLine": "\t\t女神アリスとクルックーのいつもの対談", "translatedEnglishLine": "The usual dialogue between Goddess Alice and Kurukkuu." },{ "lineNumber": 256882, "originalJapaneseLine": "\t\tアリス．好きに足掻きなさい、滅びるだろうけど", "translatedEnglishLine": "Alice: Struggle as you like, though you'll probably perish." },{ "lineNumber": 256883, "originalJapaneseLine": "\t魔軍によって川中島が攻められている", "translatedEnglishLine": "Kawanakajima is being attacked by the demon army." },{ "lineNumber": 256884, "originalJapaneseLine": "\t徹底抗戦を唱える司教もいるが、法王が撤退命令を出している", "translatedEnglishLine": "Some bishops call for all-out resistance, but the pontiff has ordered a retreat." },{ "lineNumber": 256885, "originalJapaneseLine": "\tロードリングが指揮", "translatedEnglishLine": "Lord Ring is commanding." },{ "lineNumber": 256886,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle."},{ "lineNumber": 256887,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tクルックーが滅亡した川中島に行くというので","translatedEnglishLine":"Kurukkuu intends to go to the destroyed Kawanakajima."},{ "lineNumber": 256888,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスが護衛として付いていく","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance accompanies her as a guard."},{ "lineNumber": 256889,"originalJapaneseLine":"川中島","translatedEnglishLine":"Kawanakajima."},{ "lineNumber": 256890,"originalJapaneseLine":"大河を船で渡って川中島に到着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"They crossed the great river by boat and arrived at Kawanakajima."},{ "lineNumber": 256891,"originalJapaneseLine":"すでに川中島は全土が魔軍の支配地、いつ敵と接触するか分かりません","translatedEnglishLine":"Kawanakajima is already entirely under the demon army's control; they don’t know when they'll encounter enemies."},{ "lineNumber": 256892,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーは秘密な安全ルートがあるので、サチコと二人でしたらこっそりいけたのだけど","translatedEnglishLine":"Kurukkuu has a secret safe route, so if it were just her and Sachiko, they could sneak in quietly."},{ "lineNumber": 256893,"originalJapaneseLine":"こんな大人数だったら、魔軍との接触は避けられないなと思いつつも言わない","translatedEnglishLine":"Though she thinks with such a large group, contact with the demon army is unavoidable, she doesn't say so."},{ "lineNumber": 256894,"originalJapaneseLine":"ロードリングと遭遇","translatedEnglishLine":"They meet Lord Ring."},{ "lineNumber": 256895,"originalJapaneseLine":"騎士団を連れて戦っている、何か会話","translatedEnglishLine":"He’s fighting accompanied by the knight order, some conversation occurs."},{ "lineNumber": 256896,"originalJapaneseLine":"同行はしません、別行動です","translatedEnglishLine":"They do not travel together; they act separately."},{ "lineNumber": 256897,"originalJapaneseLine":"[川中島陥落]でも出ているので、そのシーンと辻褄合うようにして下さい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Since [Fall of Kawanakajima] is also shown, please make sure the scenes are consistent."},{ "lineNumber": 256898,"originalJapaneseLine":"これは、その1週間後ぐらいのシーンとなります。","translatedEnglishLine":"This is a scene about one week after that."},{ "lineNumber": 256899,"originalJapaneseLine":"川中島の湿原地帯で休憩中","translatedEnglishLine":"Resting in the marshland area of Kawanakajima."},{ "lineNumber": 256900,"originalJapaneseLine":"サチコが怒っている、こんな横暴は神が許しません","translatedEnglishLine":"Sachiko is angry, saying such tyranny is unforgivable by God."},{ "lineNumber": 256901,"originalJapaneseLine":"きっと天罰が下るはずです。誰か信仰心の厚そうな人も同意見","translatedEnglishLine":"Surely, divine punishment will fall. Someone with strong faith agrees."},{ "lineNumber": 256902,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、クルックーだけ冷静。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, only Kurukkuu remains calm."},{ "lineNumber": 256903,"originalJapaneseLine":"法王様、そうですよねと聞かれても　そうですね、と適当な返事","translatedEnglishLine":"When asked, 'Pontiff, right?' she replies casually, 'Yes, that’s right.'"},{ "lineNumber": 256904,"originalJapaneseLine":"（この惨状を神や女神は喜んでみている、なんて言えませんね）","translatedEnglishLine":"(She can’t say that the gods or goddess are gladly watching this disaster.)"},{ "lineNumber": 256905,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tカイズの地下施設に入る","translatedEnglishLine":"Entering the underground facility of Kaizu."},{ "lineNumber": 256906,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tカイズ内","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside Kaizu."},{ "lineNumber": 256907,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t隠れていたセルさんを保護","translatedEnglishLine":"Protecting Sel-san who was hiding."},{ "lineNumber": 256908,"originalJapaneseLine":"禁断保管庫の前","translatedEnglishLine":"In front of the forbidden storage."},{ "lineNumber": 256909,"originalJapaneseLine":"中は意外と荒らされていない","translatedEnglishLine":"Surprisingly, the inside is not terribly vandalized."},{ "lineNumber": 256910,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物では無いのかもしれませんと・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe it wasn’t monsters..."},{ "lineNumber": 256911,"originalJapaneseLine":"この騒動に紛れて、何者かがすでに何かを取っていった後かもしれませんとクルックー","translatedEnglishLine":"Kurukkuu says that amidst this chaos, someone might have already taken something."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これがあの人の元気の素、明日への活力になっているのです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is that person's source of energy, the vitality for tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルさんと居るだけでも元気になるのですが、今は非常時、もっとたくさんの刺激を求めています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just being with Shiiru-san gives me energy, but now is an emergency, so I'm seeking even more stimulation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・わ、私もやりますとか誰かがランスの元へいくとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Uh, someone saying I'll do it too or going to Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、廊下
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle, hallway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か行列が出来ている・・並んでいるキャラは誰でもいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s some kind of line forming... it doesn’t matter who’s standing in it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんななんで並んでいるのか分からない、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone doesn’t know why they’re lined up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何かいい物がもえるのかもとランスも並びます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance also lines up, thinking maybe they’ll get something good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーか何かの店＝購買部のパン屋みたいなノリ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like a honey shop or something—the mood is like the bakery in the sales department.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何がもらえるんだ・・わくわくしていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What will we get... I was excited.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、食券と・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, a meal ticket and...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 汎用なので短めでシンプルに・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it's generic, keep it short and simple...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食券もらうだけのコマンドです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's just a command to receive a meal ticket.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あけましておめでとう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Happy New Year.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城でそれぽい朝の儀式、おとそ、お年玉
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A New Year’s morning ceremony at Rance Castle: Otoso (spiced sake), New Year's money.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各国の首脳陣も集まっている（一応、滅亡の可能性があるのでＩＦ処理で）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The leaders of various countries are gathered (with an IF branch in case of possible destruction).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、戦争中という雰囲気をみじんも見せずにお正月ムード
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though there’s a war going on now, not a hint of it shows—just New Year's mood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たんたんとお正月シーンが続く・・（少し長めでもいい、場違いな雰囲気が大事　）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The New Year's scene continues plainly... (a little longer is fine, the out-of-place atmosphere is important).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさんが、１０時になりました、時報のようにいいます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bisketta-san says, 'It is now 10 o'clock,' like a time signal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すると、みんな立ち上がり、さぁ、お正月はおしまい、仕事、仕事と・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then everyone stands up, saying, 'Alright, New Year's is over, work, work...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パキパキと切り替えていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They switch gears briskly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが、うむむ・・情緒のわからんやつだ、お正月は３日は仕事したら駄目なんだぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance says, 'Hmm... What a guy without emotion, you’re not supposed to work for the first three days of New Year’s.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 旦那様、旦那様が決めた事ですよ、こんな非常時だがお正月はする、２時間だけと割り切ってすると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Master, this is what you decided. Even in such an emergency, we do celebrate New Year's, but only for two hours, with a clear limit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うう・・しかしな、やっぱ正月だぞ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... but still, it’s New Year’s after all...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これが人類にとって最後のお正月になってもいいのでしたらね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If this is to be humanity’s last New Year’s, then so be it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また、世界には今も死にかけている人が多数おり、ランスさんが動かないと今もまた・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, there are still many people near death around the world, and if Rance doesn’t act, even now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、もう・・わかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, geez... I get it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今や世界の命運を握る存在となったこのランスにゆっくりとしたお正月は無かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, who now holds the fate of the world in his hands, had no leisurely New Year’s.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 川中島カイズ、女神の間に居るクルックー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kawanakajima Kaizu, Kurukkuu in the Goddess's chamber.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女神アリスとクルックーのいつもの対談
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The usual dialogue between Goddess Alice and Kurukkuu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリス．好きに足掻きなさい、滅びるだろうけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alice: Struggle as you like, though you'll probably perish.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍によって川中島が攻められている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kawanakajima is being attacked by the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徹底抗戦を唱える司教もいるが、法王が撤退命令を出している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some bishops call for all-out resistance, but the pontiff has ordered a retreat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロードリングが指揮
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Ring is commanding.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーが滅亡した川中島に行くというので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurukkuu intends to go to the destroyed Kawanakajima.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが護衛として付いていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance accompanies her as a guard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 川中島
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kawanakajima.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大河を船で渡って川中島に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They crossed the great river by boat and arrived at Kawanakajima.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すでに川中島は全土が魔軍の支配地、いつ敵と接触するか分かりません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kawanakajima is already entirely under the demon army's control; they don’t know when they'll encounter enemies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーは秘密な安全ルートがあるので、サチコと二人でしたらこっそりいけたのだけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurukkuu has a secret safe route, so if it were just her and Sachiko, they could sneak in quietly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな大人数だったら、魔軍との接触は避けられないなと思いつつも言わない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though she thinks with such a large group, contact with the demon army is unavoidable, she doesn't say so.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロードリングと遭遇
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They meet Lord Ring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 騎士団を連れて戦っている、何か会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He’s fighting accompanied by the knight order, some conversation occurs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同行はしません、別行動です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They do not travel together; they act separately.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: [川中島陥落]でも出ているので、そのシーンと辻褄合うようにして下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since [Fall of Kawanakajima] is also shown, please make sure the scenes are consistent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは、その1週間後ぐらいのシーンとなります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is a scene about one week after that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 川中島の湿原地帯で休憩中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Resting in the marshland area of Kawanakajima.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サチコが怒っている、こんな横暴は神が許しません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sachiko is angry, saying such tyranny is unforgivable by God.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっと天罰が下るはずです。誰か信仰心の厚そうな人も同意見
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surely, divine punishment will fall. Someone with strong faith agrees.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、クルックーだけ冷静。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, only Kurukkuu remains calm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 法王様、そうですよねと聞かれても　そうですね、と適当な返事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When asked, 'Pontiff, right?' she replies casually, 'Yes, that’s right.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （この惨状を神や女神は喜んでみている、なんて言えませんね）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (She can’t say that the gods or goddess are gladly watching this disaster.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カイズの地下施設に入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Entering the underground facility of Kaizu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カイズ内
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside Kaizu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 隠れていたセルさんを保護
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Protecting Sel-san who was hiding.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 禁断保管庫の前
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In front of the forbidden storage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中は意外と荒らされていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surprisingly, the inside is not terribly vandalized.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物では無いのかもしれませんと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe it wasn’t monsters...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この騒動に紛れて、何者かがすでに何かを取っていった後かもしれませんとクルックー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurukkuu says that amidst this chaos, someone might have already taken something.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

I was excited."},{"lineNumber":256861,"originalJapaneseLine":"はい、食券と・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Here, a meal ticket and..."},{"lineNumber":256862,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　汎用なので短めでシンプルに・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Since it's generic, keep it short and simple..."},{"lineNumber":256863,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　食券もらうだけのコマンドです","translatedEnglishLine":"It's just a command to receive a meal ticket."},{"lineNumber":256864,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tあけましておめでとう","translatedEnglishLine":"Happy New Year."},{"lineNumber":256865,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tランス城でそれぽい朝の儀式、おとそ、お年玉","translatedEnglishLine":"A New Year’s morning ceremony at Rance Castle: Otoso (spiced sake), New Year's money."},{"lineNumber":256866,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t各国の首脳陣も集まっている（一応、滅亡の可能性があるのでＩＦ処理で）","translatedEnglishLine":"The leaders of various countries are gathered (with an IF branch in case of possible destruction)."},{"lineNumber":256867,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t今、戦争中という雰囲気をみじんも見せずにお正月ムード","translatedEnglishLine":"Even though there’s a war going on now, not a hint of it shows—just New Year's mood."},{"lineNumber":256868,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tたんたんとお正月シーンが続く・・（少し長めでもいい、場違いな雰囲気が大事　）","translatedEnglishLine":"The New Year's scene continues plainly... (a little longer is fine, the out-of-place atmosphere is important)."},{"lineNumber":256869,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t　　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":256870,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tビスケッタさんが、１０時になりました、時報のようにいいます","translatedEnglishLine":"Bisketta-san says, 'It is now 10 o'clock,' like a time signal."},{"lineNumber":256871,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tすると、みんな立ち上がり、さぁ、お正月はおしまい、仕事、仕事と・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Then everyone stands up, saying, 'Alright, New Year's is over, work, work...'"},{"lineNumber":256872,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tパキパキと切り替えていく","translatedEnglishLine":"They switch gears briskly."},{"lineNumber":256873,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tランスが、うむむ・・情緒のわからんやつだ、お正月は３日は仕事したら駄目なんだぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance says, 'Hmm... What a guy without emotion, you’re not supposed to work for the first three days of New Year’s.'"},{ "lineNumber": 256874, "originalJapaneseLine": "旦那様、旦那様が決めた事ですよ、こんな非常時だがお正月はする、２時間だけと割り切ってすると", "translatedEnglishLine": "Master, this is what you decided. Even in such an emergency, we do celebrate New Year's, but only for two hours, with a clear limit." },{ "lineNumber": 256875, "originalJapaneseLine": "うう・・しかしな、やっぱ正月だぞ・・", "translatedEnglishLine": "Ugh... but still, it’s New Year’s after all..." },{ "lineNumber": 256876, "originalJapaneseLine": "これが人類にとって最後のお正月になってもいいのでしたらね", "translatedEnglishLine": "If this is to be humanity’s last New Year’s, then so be it." },{ "lineNumber": 256877, "originalJapaneseLine": "また、世界には今も死にかけている人が多数おり、ランスさんが動かないと今もまた・・", "translatedEnglishLine": "Also, there are still many people near death around the world, and if Rance doesn’t act, even now..." },{ "lineNumber": 256878, "originalJapaneseLine": "ああ、もう・・わかった", "translatedEnglishLine": "Ah, geez... I get it." },{ "lineNumber": 256879, "originalJapaneseLine": "今や世界の命運を握る存在となったこのランスにゆっくりとしたお正月は無かった。", "translatedEnglishLine": "Rance, who now holds the fate of the world in his hands, had no leisurely New Year’s." },{ "lineNumber": 256880, "originalJapaneseLine": "\t\t川中島カイズ、女神の間に居るクルックー", "translatedEnglishLine": "Kawanakajima Kaizu, Kurukkuu in the Goddess's chamber." },{ "lineNumber": 256881, "originalJapaneseLine": "\t\t女神アリスとクルックーのいつもの対談", "translatedEnglishLine": "The usual dialogue between Goddess Alice and Kurukkuu." },{ "lineNumber": 256882, "originalJapaneseLine": "\t\tアリス．好きに足掻きなさい、滅びるだろうけど", "translatedEnglishLine": "Alice: Struggle as you like, though you'll probably perish." },{ "lineNumber": 256883, "originalJapaneseLine": "\t魔軍によって川中島が攻められている", "translatedEnglishLine": "Kawanakajima is being attacked by the demon army." },{ "lineNumber": 256884, "originalJapaneseLine": "\t徹底抗戦を唱える司教もいるが、法王が撤退命令を出している", "translatedEnglishLine": "Some bishops call for all-out resistance, but the pontiff has ordered a retreat." },{ "lineNumber": 256885, "originalJapaneseLine": "\tロードリングが指揮", "translatedEnglishLine": "Lord Ring is commanding." },{ "lineNumber": 256886,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle."},{ "lineNumber": 256887,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tクルックーが滅亡した川中島に行くというので","translatedEnglishLine":"Kurukkuu intends to go to the destroyed Kawanakajima."},{ "lineNumber": 256888,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスが護衛として付いていく","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance accompanies her as a guard."},{ "lineNumber": 256889,"originalJapaneseLine":"川中島","translatedEnglishLine":"Kawanakajima."},{ "lineNumber": 256890,"originalJapaneseLine":"大河を船で渡って川中島に到着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"They crossed the great river by boat and arrived at Kawanakajima."},{ "lineNumber": 256891,"originalJapaneseLine":"すでに川中島は全土が魔軍の支配地、いつ敵と接触するか分かりません","translatedEnglishLine":"Kawanakajima is already entirely under the demon army's control; they don’t know when they'll encounter enemies."},{ "lineNumber": 256892,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーは秘密な安全ルートがあるので、サチコと二人でしたらこっそりいけたのだけど","translatedEnglishLine":"Kurukkuu has a secret safe route, so if it were just her and Sachiko, they could sneak in quietly."},{ "lineNumber": 256893,"originalJapaneseLine":"こんな大人数だったら、魔軍との接触は避けられないなと思いつつも言わない","translatedEnglishLine":"Though she thinks with such a large group, contact with the demon army is unavoidable, she doesn't say so."},{ "lineNumber": 256894,"originalJapaneseLine":"ロードリングと遭遇","translatedEnglishLine":"They meet Lord Ring."},{ "lineNumber": 256895,"originalJapaneseLine":"騎士団を連れて戦っている、何か会話","translatedEnglishLine":"He’s fighting accompanied by the knight order, some conversation occurs."},{ "lineNumber": 256896,"originalJapaneseLine":"同行はしません、別行動です","translatedEnglishLine":"They do not travel together; they act separately."},{ "lineNumber": 256897,"originalJapaneseLine":"[川中島陥落]でも出ているので、そのシーンと辻褄合うようにして下さい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Since [Fall of Kawanakajima] is also shown, please make sure the scenes are consistent."},{ "lineNumber": 256898,"originalJapaneseLine":"これは、その1週間後ぐらいのシーンとなります。","translatedEnglishLine":"This is a scene about one week after that."},{ "lineNumber": 256899,"originalJapaneseLine":"川中島の湿原地帯で休憩中","translatedEnglishLine":"Resting in the marshland area of Kawanakajima."},{ "lineNumber": 256900,"originalJapaneseLine":"サチコが怒っている、こんな横暴は神が許しません","translatedEnglishLine":"Sachiko is angry, saying such tyranny is unforgivable by God."},{ "lineNumber": 256901,"originalJapaneseLine":"きっと天罰が下るはずです。誰か信仰心の厚そうな人も同意見","translatedEnglishLine":"Surely, divine punishment will fall. Someone with strong faith agrees."},{ "lineNumber": 256902,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、クルックーだけ冷静。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, only Kurukkuu remains calm."},{ "lineNumber": 256903,"originalJapaneseLine":"法王様、そうですよねと聞かれても　そうですね、と適当な返事","translatedEnglishLine":"When asked, 'Pontiff, right?' she replies casually, 'Yes, that’s right.'"},{ "lineNumber": 256904,"originalJapaneseLine":"（この惨状を神や女神は喜んでみている、なんて言えませんね）","translatedEnglishLine":"(She can’t say that the gods or goddess are gladly watching this disaster.)"},{ "lineNumber": 256905,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tカイズの地下施設に入る","translatedEnglishLine":"Entering the underground facility of Kaizu."},{ "lineNumber": 256906,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tカイズ内","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside Kaizu."},{ "lineNumber": 256907,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t隠れていたセルさんを保護","translatedEnglishLine":"Protecting Sel-san who was hiding."},{ "lineNumber": 256908,"originalJapaneseLine":"禁断保管庫の前","translatedEnglishLine":"In front of the forbidden storage."},{ "lineNumber": 256909,"originalJapaneseLine":"中は意外と荒らされていない","translatedEnglishLine":"Surprisingly, the inside is not terribly vandalized."},{ "lineNumber": 256910,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物では無いのかもしれませんと・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe it wasn’t monsters..."},{ "lineNumber": 256911,"originalJapaneseLine":"この騒動に紛れて、何者かがすでに何かを取っていった後かもしれませんとクルックー","translatedEnglishLine":"Kurukkuu says that amidst this chaos, someone might have already taken something."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これがあの人の元気の素、明日への活力になっているのです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is that person's source of energy, the vitality for tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルさんと居るだけでも元気になるのですが、今は非常時、もっとたくさんの刺激を求めています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just being with Shiiru-san gives me energy, but now is an emergency, so I'm seeking even more stimulation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・わ、私もやりますとか誰かがランスの元へいくとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Uh, someone saying I'll do it too or going to Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、廊下
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle, hallway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か行列が出来ている・・並んでいるキャラは誰でもいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s some kind of line forming... it doesn’t matter who’s standing in it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんななんで並んでいるのか分からない、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone doesn’t know why they’re lined up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何かいい物がもえるのかもとランスも並びます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance also lines up, thinking maybe they’ll get something good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーか何かの店＝購買部のパン屋みたいなノリ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like a honey shop or something—the mood is like the bakery in the sales department.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何がもらえるんだ・・わくわくしていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What will we get... I was excited.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、食券と・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, a meal ticket and...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 汎用なので短めでシンプルに・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it's generic, keep it short and simple...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食券もらうだけのコマンドです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's just a command to receive a meal ticket.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あけましておめでとう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Happy New Year.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城でそれぽい朝の儀式、おとそ、お年玉
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A New Year’s morning ceremony at Rance Castle: Otoso (spiced sake), New Year's money.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各国の首脳陣も集まっている（一応、滅亡の可能性があるのでＩＦ処理で）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The leaders of various countries are gathered (with an IF branch in case of possible destruction).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、戦争中という雰囲気をみじんも見せずにお正月ムード
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though there’s a war going on now, not a hint of it shows—just New Year's mood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たんたんとお正月シーンが続く・・（少し長めでもいい、場違いな雰囲気が大事　）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The New Year's scene continues plainly... (a little longer is fine, the out-of-place atmosphere is important).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさんが、１０時になりました、時報のようにいいます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bisketta-san says, 'It is now 10 o'clock,' like a time signal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すると、みんな立ち上がり、さぁ、お正月はおしまい、仕事、仕事と・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then everyone stands up, saying, 'Alright, New Year's is over, work, work...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パキパキと切り替えていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They switch gears briskly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが、うむむ・・情緒のわからんやつだ、お正月は３日は仕事したら駄目なんだぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance says, 'Hmm... What a guy without emotion, you’re not supposed to work for the first three days of New Year’s.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 旦那様、旦那様が決めた事ですよ、こんな非常時だがお正月はする、２時間だけと割り切ってすると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Master, this is what you decided. Even in such an emergency, we do celebrate New Year's, but only for two hours, with a clear limit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うう・・しかしな、やっぱ正月だぞ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... but still, it’s New Year’s after all...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これが人類にとって最後のお正月になってもいいのでしたらね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If this is to be humanity’s last New Year’s, then so be it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また、世界には今も死にかけている人が多数おり、ランスさんが動かないと今もまた・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, there are still many people near death around the world, and if Rance doesn’t act, even now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、もう・・わかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, geez... I get it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今や世界の命運を握る存在となったこのランスにゆっくりとしたお正月は無かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, who now holds the fate of the world in his hands, had no leisurely New Year’s.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 川中島カイズ、女神の間に居るクルックー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kawanakajima Kaizu, Kurukkuu in the Goddess's chamber.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女神アリスとクルックーのいつもの対談
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The usual dialogue between Goddess Alice and Kurukkuu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリス．好きに足掻きなさい、滅びるだろうけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alice: Struggle as you like, though you'll probably perish.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍によって川中島が攻められている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kawanakajima is being attacked by the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徹底抗戦を唱える司教もいるが、法王が撤退命令を出している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some bishops call for all-out resistance, but the pontiff has ordered a retreat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロードリングが指揮
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Ring is commanding.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーが滅亡した川中島に行くというので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurukkuu intends to go to the destroyed Kawanakajima.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが護衛として付いていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance accompanies her as a guard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 川中島
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kawanakajima.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大河を船で渡って川中島に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They crossed the great river by boat and arrived at Kawanakajima.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すでに川中島は全土が魔軍の支配地、いつ敵と接触するか分かりません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kawanakajima is already entirely under the demon army's control; they don’t know when they'll encounter enemies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーは秘密な安全ルートがあるので、サチコと二人でしたらこっそりいけたのだけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurukkuu has a secret safe route, so if it were just her and Sachiko, they could sneak in quietly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな大人数だったら、魔軍との接触は避けられないなと思いつつも言わない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though she thinks with such a large group, contact with the demon army is unavoidable, she doesn't say so.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロードリングと遭遇
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They meet Lord Ring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 騎士団を連れて戦っている、何か会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He’s fighting accompanied by the knight order, some conversation occurs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同行はしません、別行動です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They do not travel together; they act separately.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: [川中島陥落]でも出ているので、そのシーンと辻褄合うようにして下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since [Fall of Kawanakajima] is also shown, please make sure the scenes are consistent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは、その1週間後ぐらいのシーンとなります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is a scene about one week after that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 川中島の湿原地帯で休憩中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Resting in the marshland area of Kawanakajima.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サチコが怒っている、こんな横暴は神が許しません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sachiko is angry, saying such tyranny is unforgivable by God.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっと天罰が下るはずです。誰か信仰心の厚そうな人も同意見
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surely, divine punishment will fall. Someone with strong faith agrees.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、クルックーだけ冷静。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, only Kurukkuu remains calm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 法王様、そうですよねと聞かれても　そうですね、と適当な返事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When asked, 'Pontiff, right?' she replies casually, 'Yes, that’s right.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （この惨状を神や女神は喜んでみている、なんて言えませんね）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (She can’t say that the gods or goddess are gladly watching this disaster.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カイズの地下施設に入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Entering the underground facility of Kaizu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カイズ内
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside Kaizu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 隠れていたセルさんを保護
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Protecting Sel-san who was hiding.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 禁断保管庫の前
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In front of the forbidden storage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中は意外と荒らされていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surprisingly, the inside is not terribly vandalized.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物では無いのかもしれませんと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe it wasn’t monsters...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この騒動に紛れて、何者かがすでに何かを取っていった後かもしれませんとクルックー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurukkuu says that amidst this chaos, someone might have already taken something.
